entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new -v displays exception #29937
  • dotnet build/pack generates no executable in NuGet Package #29935
  • Is System.drawing.common vulnerable to CVE-2021-24112 in .Net SDK 6.0 #29927
  • Running `dotnet watch` results in an error that says The specified task executable location "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk" is invalid #29922

Closed

  • restore/build/publish hanging on .NET > 6.0.401 #29662
  • dotnet test does no longer accept a project path after updating to NET 7.0.101 #29543

PullRequests

Created

  • Stable branding for 7.0.200 GA release #29942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29939
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29938
  • Introduce Dependabot for updatig the same dependecies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29923
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0.2] add warning scrubber #29934
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [Backport] Prevent `dotnet test` verbosity from being ignored #29557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29894
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update GenerateLayout.targets for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers packaging structure changes #29906
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
